Portal é aquele jogo que chegamos ao fim a pedir mais.

Dei por mim a terminar o jogo pela 3ª vez e a ficar triste por já o ter acabado. Tudo neste jogo é brilhante. Desde a base temática do jogo, os portais que estão muito bem pensados e estruturados, passando pelos puzzles, quebra-cabeças, história e a própria soundtrack do jogo. 

A GlaDos dá aquele toque assustador / irónico ao jogo. Consegue ser mórbida o suficiente mas de uma maneira bastante súbtil e calma. É isso que eu gosto num jogo. Só me arrependi de não ter comprado o Portal 2, que por sua vez mais passei. 

Escusado será dizer que recomendo a toda a gente e esperava uma sequela do 2...

Classic first-person puzzle game. After the first three test chambers, you'll want to finish it.
Not [i]a lot[/i] of total game time; but with the advanced/community made chambers it has virutally unlimited replay value.
10/10 Would gladly be lied to about the cake.
made me dizzy, try before you buy, especially if you play on a big monitor

最初、順当過ぎる進み具合に、当然ながら何の違和感も無かったのです。
なんてことはない、新感覚ではあるけれども普通のパズルゲーム…だと。
しかし、ゲームに馴染みはじめた頃、絶妙なさじ加減でその皮肉の違和感に気付きます。
パズルゲームとして遊ぶも、気付けば深淵なるストーリーに踊らされ、クリアしていました。

斬新かつ巧妙な手口で我々を魅了する、このゲームをプレイしない手はございません！

Game is short, replay is OK but gets repetitive. Buy if under 5 dollars.

Great start to the Portal Series I highly recommend this game if you like single player story driven puzzle games, but make sure to take a break if you get stuck on a level and get frusterated. Note: Don't break your computer just walk away if you get stuck

Quite a shame it took me seven years to finally play this game. I was missing out from such a great game.

Portal is funny. It is short, but sweet. It makes you use your brain and think, which more games should. 

I bought it during the fall sale, and beat the story in a little under 3 hours. But there was plenty more modes/maps to complete. So I think I will continue having fun with this game for quite some time.

I would definitely recommend.
Why haven't you got this already.
O melhor jogo de puzzle já feito e com história excelente!

This. Game. Is. EPIC!
I realy like the story. Although it is not a really deep story with lots of background info it still is has an amazing storyline. 
Also the humor, really if you like a game with humor then this is the perfect game for you. The voices, the jokes.. well basicly everything!
Also I want to mention something about the difficulty.
You will start with some easy ''rooms'' to solve, but further on in the game you will see that it really is letting you think and see things from other perspectives. It is not too easy, neither too difficult!
I really enjoy this game and i'd highly recomend it as a game you'd play when you want to relax, but still acomplish something. :)
P.S the only negative thing about the game is that it's short, about 2 - 2,5 hours of playtime

Das Spielprinzip und die Idee sind einfach einzigartig und das Spiel ist mittlerweile ja ein echter Klassiker. Nur leider gibt es meiner Meinung nach echt wenig Level und die sind auch noch recht einfach zu lösen.
Es macht wirklich Spaß, nur der ist halt relativ schnell vorbei, dann kann man sich noch in den bereits gemeisterten Leveln auf Zeit und Schritte testen, was sich als wahre Herausforderung herausstellt.
Man sollte es sich auf jeden Fall mal angesehn haben, für mehr Inhalt steht ja auch noch der zweite Teil zur Verfügung!
My head is about to explode. Well done 10/10

Конечно , в момент выхода игры она стала прорывом. Но , стоит отметить , что по всем признакам , Valve просто провели эксперимент , т.е. первая часть портала была их попыткой создать , что они задумали , и у них получилось! А значит , можно активно заняться второй частью  :) 
   Сюжет проходится быстро и , по большей части легко за 2-3 часа , так что , если вы не играли еще в портал , ни в 1 ни во 2 часть , то советую сперва пройти Portal , для ознакомления с механикой и принципом игры , а уже потом заходить в Portal 2 , дабы уже знать что к чему , вообщем единственный минус - продолжительность игры , а в остальном все шикарно!

Oh, now I see what all the hub bub is about.  First person puzzle game with an original mechanic.  Played it in a one night marathon.  Only had to get outside help once.  Wished I hadn't, I'll always wonder if I would have figured it out on my own.  Anyway, if this game isn't considered a classic it should be.  Great game I wll always remember playing it, and will undoubtably refer to in the future.

Played it on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS with keyboard and mouse.  Worked flawlessly.

Super Cool.
Highly addictive. Simple idea, executed incredibly well.

A classic. Short and sweet, (you can beat it in just one sitting), and a ton of fun from start to finish. A must-play.

This game is amazing and worth every penny. It has a very short story and only took me 1 hour to beat, but it has alot of easter eggs. It has fantastic gameplay and some of the achievements are actually kind of hard to get. But tjis is a great game over all.

I had this sitting in my library after I picked it up during a sale, so I thought I'd give it a try. I read the reviews and knew it was a brilliant game and I was truly blown away. 

It's challenging but fair, it has frequent "checkpoints"(not in the traditional sense) and you don't have to spend a lot of time walking back if you mess up, which gives you a chance to try again and again till you make it, without being frurstrating. It feels quite rewarding when you manage to go through a tough section of a puzzle. There's no hand-holding(aside from the introductory stages) and you have to use your brain to figure what you should do in each section. It's an impressive feat how in the short length of the game you manage to adjust seamlessly to the requirements of each puzzle and you end up combining the portals  intuitively. I imagine there's some room for creativity too, especially in the tougher levels, it seems like there could be more than one ways to complete some levels depending on your imagination/perception.

The humor might not appeal to everyone but it's there and it's great. It's subtle, dark at times and it made me laugh out loud on a few occasions. There's also a mysterious undertone and the game will also make you question your actions sometimes. [spoiler] Companion Cube, I'm really sorry. You were my best friend and you will be duly missed. [/spoiler]

I finished the game in one sitting (when you start playing you'll want to see what's next, it's addictive) in 3.3 hours, so you could say it's a short game but it's absolutely amazing! Actually the game's length can be considered as a positive, it's perfect if you only have a few hours to spare. There's also a bonus section (that I haven't checked out yet) that unlocks after you finish the game once, so there's some replay value. 

Find out for yourself if the cake is a lie, you won't regret it! 
Cake/10

I didn't go to college. One of the system requirements should be you must have a 4 year degree because if you won't know how to play this game. I didn't let that stop me after take hours to beat the first 2 levels I knew i wouldnt beat the game so you know what I did. I went to college study my fucking ass off for 5 years and came back to the game when i was done. Turns out my monitor was broken the whole time... spend 50 bucks to get it fixed beat the game in a few hours and now i am in over 50k worth of debt when it was really a $50 fix really makes you wonder. Not sure whos fault it is but the game is a solid 8 of 10. 
Note:
Don't go to college to play this game, just pay the 50 bucks!

Aperture Science...
Worked Great Unlike Portal 2

So, I brought portal after seeing and really liking portal 2 but was actually a little disappointed by it. It's not that it's a bad game, the puzzles are alright though I found that the challenge was more carrying out the task such as a double fling rather than working out what you have to do, but my main issue is the story. Don't get me wrong; I appreciated the subtly of it - only getting hints that get stronger a long the way -, but otherwise you just feel a bit detatched and like you're just a faceless person aimlessly doing puzzles for the fun of it. If it could have had an introductory cut scene at least it could have given the whole game a bit more meaning, and the ending a bit more weight. Honest opinion; get portal 2, don't worry about this one.
Also the companion cube didn't speak to me, very disappointed. :(
Still awesome...
Un increible juego. Recomendado :)

Ótimo jogo. Divertido e surpreendente. Mesmo engine do HL2: o Source. O uso de gravidade e o 'pensar fora da caixa' do uso de portais para resolver puzzles, somado ao humor maluco que permeia o jogo fazem com que este jogo seja um sucesso total.

 Joguem. Pena que é um pouco curto, mas já tem Portal 2 pra quem gostou ;)
Best $10 ever spent. And the song at the end is the best on history

How can I even start to describe this game?!? 
This is my favorite game ! (Portal 2 also) 
They way the whole setting of the game is, is amazing and I love every single minute of it. 
GlaDOS is one of my favorite characthers and I cannot get enough of thinking with portals! 
If you have not played this game it is a big mistake, I love this game, the universe, setting, characthers, gameplay and the story. 
10/10.

Part of the legendary Orange Box, this was originally included in the bundle supposedly because Valve wasn't sure if it'd be popular or not.  It definitely proved to be so, and with good reason - it's fantastic.

This is a game with no added fluff - it's cut itself down to the bare bones, leaving just the best bits.

It seems like a simple game until you start playing it. The graphics are good but the physics are some of the best I have ever see. This is probably my most favorite puzzle game series. No two levels are the same and it will have you really thinking till the end. The story is good but no one buys this game for the story.
Gran juego, un poco corto pero vale cada centavo gastando en el ademas de contar con el villano más caristatico de los videojuegos. Si aún no lo tienes compralo ahora mismo.
"Juego Bueno... divertido al primer intento.. si quieres pasartelo otra vez es aburrido.. aun asi juego recomendadisimo para cualquier jugador! :D"

This game is awesome, fun achivements, a sense of humor. Which is rare for a puzzle game. Some of the puzzle are pretty hard. But after you beat the game, it feels like there is nothing to do. Anyway, the story is awesome, the gameplay is awesome, the character(s) are perfect.

Portal - затягивающий шутер от 1го лица в котором никого на удивление нельзя убить! Что порадовало, так то, что имеется хоть какойто-то сюжет!

Мы якобы участник теста нового прибора который недавно был изобретён, но в конце прохождения тестов, мы узнаём, что нас использовали и хотели убить и мы конечно же решаемся спастись с нашим супер телепортером! В конце-концов мы узнаём что "голос" - это робот и как бы мы из мести решаем его уничтножить!

После прохождения сюжета игра не заканчивается! Нам даются более сложные миссии за которые дадут очивку!

Удачного прохождения! Оценка: 7/10
Uno de los mejores títulos de Valve, es una obra de arte de los pies a la cabeza, lo único negativo sería la durabilidad, es bastante corto, aun así merece muchísimo la pena.

Portal surgiu com uma proposta totalmente diferente e cativante, um jogo único e envolvente que te  deixa preso do início ao fim, onde é preciso muita estratégia e pensamento rápido para solucionar os diversos tipos de fases, aqui não é sair atirando pra todo lado, Portal de faz pensar, analisar para encontar a solução. De contra achei muito curto, deveriam prolongar um pouquinho mais o final, se você for "bem esperto" ou um "nerd da vida" irá zerar rapidamente.  Concerteza um game clássico . Recomendo!!!

Si vous pensez que ce sera du gâteau de boucler cette vingtaine d'énigmes, vous pouvez toujours en redemander une part de plus : lancez vous dans la résolution des salles bonus et défis qui vous demandrons à la fois réflexion et habilité, et qui permetterons de profiter un peu plus de ce générateur de portails.
